original_title: มือปืน/โลก/พระ/จัน
overview: Set in a future Bangkok, the story picks-up after a hit-gone-wrong on Iron Cop, the area police chief. The would-be killer Pae, together with his equally inept collection of thugs, now become wanted men themselves as the Thai underworld bristles with the shame and dishonor of such an ignoble bungling.
tagline: Mobster move your ass, Big surprise is coming!
title: Killer Tattoo
